name: RefreshDashboardSharingLink
description:
Refresh the sharing link for a specific dashboard.

This tool is used to refresh the sharing link of a dashboard within a project. It should be called when a user wants to update an existing dashboard's sharing link to extend its validity or ensure it's up to date.

parameters.name: dashboard_identification_number
parameters.description: An integer representing the specific dashboard to refresh the sharing link for.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project. Retrieve it via the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dashboard_sharing_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing sharing link settings such as creation date, status, access token, and security options.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
